title: God Hates Goths. Period.  =P
content:
This is a quote from a pamplet I saw on another foriegn forum:[quote]Quote:[hr]
Gothic is a very obscure and often dangerous culture that young teenagers are prone to participating in. The gothic culture leads young, susceptible minds into an imagined world of evil, darkness, and violence. Please seek immediate attention through counselling, prayer, and parental guidance to rid your child of Satan's temptations if five or more of the following are applicable to your child:

Put an X next to things that apply to you, a + next to things that sometimes apply to you and a - by the things that don't apply to you at all.

[X] Frequently wears black clothing.
[X] Wears band and/or rock t-shirts.[Wow, I didn't know that made you goth *insert sarcasm here*]
[X] Wears excessive black eye makeup, lipstick, or nailpolish.
[X] Wears any odd, silver jewelry or symbols. Some of these include: reversed crosses, pentagrams, pentacles, ankhs or various other Satanic worshipping symbols.
[X] Shows an interest in piercings or tattoos.
[X] Listens to gothic or any other anti-social genres of music. (Marilyn Manson claims to be the Anti-Christ, and publicly speaks against the Lord. Please discard any such albums IMMEDIATELY.) [Hahahaha]
[X] Associates with other people that dress, act or speak eccentrically.
[X] Shows a declining interest in wholesome activities, such as: the Bible, prayer, church or sports.
[X] Shows an increasing interest in death, vampires, magic, the occult, witchcraft or anything else that involves Satan.
[+] Takes drugs.
[+] Drinks alcohol.
[X] Is suicidal and/or depressed.
[+] Cuts, burns or partakes in any other method of self-mutilation.(This is a Satanic ritual that uses pain to detract from the light of God and His love. Please seek immediate attention for this at your local mental health center.)
[X] Complains of boredom.
[+] Sleeps too excessively or too little.
[X] Is excessively awake during the night.
[+] Dislikes sunlight or any other form of light. (This pertains to vampires promoting the idea that His light is of no use.)
[X] Demands an unusual amount of privacy.
[+] Spends large amounts of time alone.
[X] Requests time alone and quietness. (This is so that your child may speak to evil sprits through meditation
[X] Insists on spending time with friends while unaccompanied by an adult.
[X] Disregards authority figures; teachers, priests, nuns and elders are but a few examples of this.
[+] Misbehaves at school.
[+] Misbehaves at home.
[+] Eats excessively or too little.
[X] Eats goth-related foods. Count Chocula cereal is an example of this.
[X] Drinks blood or expresses an interest in drinking blood. (Vampires believe this is how to attain Satan. This act is very dangerous and should be stopped immediately.)
[X] Watches cable television or any other corrupted media sources. (Ask your local church for proper programs that your child may watch.)
[X] Plays videos games that contains violence or role-playing nature.
[X] Uses the internet excessively and frequently makes time for the computer.
[X] Makes Satanic symbols and/or violently shakes head to music.
[+] Dances to music in a provocative or sexual manner.
[X] Expresses an interest in sex.
[0] Is homosexual and/or bisexual.
[X] Pursues dangerous cult religions. Such include: Satanism, Scientology, Philosophy, Paganism, Wicca, Hinduism and Buddhism.
[-] Wears pins, stickers or anything else that contains these various phrases: "I'm so gothic, I'm dead", "Woe is me", or "I'm a goth".
[+] Claims to be a goth.
[hr][/quote]

XD XD XD XD XD XD XD~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Goth:
content:
Gah!!! Finnally!!! An exuse to use this smiley!!!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-goth.gif[/img]

Um... I disagree with half of that;

[quote]Quote:[hr]Watches cable television or any other corrupted media sources. (Ask your local church for proper programs that your child may watch.)[hr][/quote]

That may be a bit too extream 4 me

[quote]Quote:[hr]Complains of boredom.[hr][/quote]

Darn, this conversation is boring... huh? Oh!!! Crap!!! No; I am not goth, but I do get board.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Misbehaves at school.[hr][/quote]

Um... this article seems to say, "Either your Goth, or an Angel"; there is no room for pure human nature.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Uses the internet excessively and frequently makes time for the computer.[hr][/quote]

Does this make Harvey and I goth? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-goth.gif[/img]

[quote]Quote:[hr]Is suicidal [hr][/quote]

If their dead; it's too late

[quote]Quote:[hr]Requests time alone and quietness. (This is so that your child may speak to evil sprits through meditation[hr][/quote]

Um... I like privacy; so I can change into a swim suit, when taking a shower, and when writting stories... meditating!!! Heck NO!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img]

[quote]Quote:[hr]Drinks blood or expresses an interest in drinking blood. (Vampires believe this is how to attain Satan. This act is very dangerous and should be stopped immediately.)[hr][/quote]

um... I lick my cuts so that they don't hurt as bad; if satan were in the blood; that we are, by nature, bad.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Plays videos games that contains violence or role-playing nature.[hr][/quote]

Oh My Gosh!!! Commander Keen Is GOTH!!! I... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ... I... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ... I killed a yorp!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]


Um... I am against goth... but this pamphlet is too extreamist!!!

-- NAJAWA --

title: Roflmmfao.
content:
[hr]Whacked Out Fanatic [X] Expresses an interest in sex.
[hr]Rofl.

[hr]Whacked Out Fanatic [X] Eats goth-related foods. Count Chocula cereal is an example of this.
[hr]ROFL!!

[hr]Whacked Out Fanatic [X] Pursues dangerous cult religions. Such include: Satanism, Scientology, Philosophy, Paganism, Wicca, Hinduism and Buddhism.
[hr][img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

This is pure gold.

It's scary that some may not take it as a work of comedy, though.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Roflmmfao.
content:
Hahaha, that is so lame. It's obviously a joke and made most probably to be against Christianity by making everything extreme and most things false. It'd be the same if I claimed that everyone that uses internet is connected to evil spirits while doing so. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]
IMKO Goth is lame, it will probably end in few years, and we should be more worried about something else, for example governments gaining more power over us via media and stuff.
Let's see:

"[X] Frequently wears black clothing."
Oh, I just have something fuzzy image of black colour being used in clothes for hundreds of years. And doesn't Catholic priests wear black?

"[X] Shows an interest in piercings or tattoos."
What's so evil in that? I can't imagine "Jesus loves you" tatooed on your neck being that bad.

"[X] Listens to gothic or any other anti-social genres of music. (Marilyn Manson claims to be the Anti-Christ, and publicly speaks against the Lord. Please discard any such albums IMMEDIATELY.)"
For more, read: [url=http://www.johnnyleeclary.com/manson.htm]www.johnnyleeclary.com/manson.htm[/url]

"[X] Shows a declining interest in wholesome activities, such as: the Bible, prayer, church or sports."
Yes, practically there is no other activities than pray & play (sports).

"[+] Takes drugs."
"[+] Drinks alcohol."
"[X] Is suicidal and/or depressed."
Didn't know those bums there are that Gothic.. Or those many middle-aged Finnish..

"[X] Complains of boredom."
Well, what if one is bored? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]

"[+] Sleeps too excessively or too little."
Everybody doesn't need ten hours a night..

"[X] Is excessively awake during the night."
I like to be awake during both day and night.. As far as I know the night isn't anything evil time when something evil moves around.

"[X] Demands an unusual amount of privacy."
"[+] Spends large amounts of time alone."
Not everyone has friends.

"[X] Insists on spending time with friends while unaccompanied by an adult."
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] Kids around here are unaccompanied by an adult since age of five or four when they can run around with their friends.

"[X] Disregards authority figures; teachers, priests, nuns and elders are but a few examples of this."
Most of teachers are full of bs. Or should someone believe teacher telling God doesn't exist and accept the scientific stuff he/she offers?

"[X] Pursues dangerous cult religions. Such include: Satanism, Scientology, Philosophy, Paganism, Wicca, Hinduism and Buddhism."
Since when has philosophy been a religion? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]


Anyways, I can't understand why I bothered answering to those things, since this crap is some sort of joke and purposefully made to be annoying. Or if it's not a joke, then I will [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] at that person.Eat your veggies!

title: Man!!!
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]And doesn't Catholic priests wear black?[hr][/quote]

Oh My Gosh!!! Your right!!!

[quote]Quote:[hr]What's so evil in that? I can't imagine "Jesus loves you" tatooed on your neck being that bad.[hr][/quote]

Scrubs vigorously at temporary tattoo [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-shikadi.gif[/img]

[quote]Quote:[hr]Yes, practically there is no other activities than pray & play (sports).[hr][/quote]

No KR!!! You have the wrong set of priorities; Sleep for exactly 10 hours (no more, no less). It must be from 9:00PM to 7:00AM (It must be sound sleep; not fitful). Eat cherios (Lucky Charms use pagan symbols, frosted flakes [every once in a while] have demonic star shapes [probably willed be the devil] and anything with sugar could have tiny molecular structures that form demonic shapes). Read the bible till 10:00AM (Jobs are in the public, and that is secular; thus demonic). Bathroom break till 10:15AM. Pray till 12:00PM. Lunch; rice. Read Bible till 3:00PM. Meditate on Christs passion till 4:00PM. Take a bathroom break till 4:15PM. Free time; now you may read the bible, or pray interchangably!!! *Insterts sarcasm here* Go to bed, and think of Jesus till you are asleep. Oh, and on Sundays... You are granted one hour for church. Sports are allowed during free time, but only on ever day that is divisible by 3. /joke

Whoever wrote the goth thing has the mential bias needed to truely beleive in the above statement.

[quote]Quote:[hr][X] Show any intrest in sex[hr][/quote]

Um... if I remember correctly; in the middle ages; to be goth was to beleive the world was evil. This meant that he greatest sin one could commit, was to bring a soul into the world. I think things may have changed; but goth used to be a very spiritual thing, where people did servere penance, and were celebant; to reproduce was considered evil.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-goth.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Man!!!
content: Just to add that these days sex hardly leads to reproduction unless otherwise wanted, because of the efficient birth control. If case getting pregnant, they'll abort.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Man!!!
content:
*Meanwhile at Sunnyside Church...*

Priest: Your holiness? Those antigoth pamphlets were sent out this morning.

Bishop: Excellent.

Priest: But, uh, did they really have to have the sign of the beast on them?

Bishop: Of course! God has instructed me! It will all become clear when our glorious crusaders in sunday school go out and matyr themselves.

[Dear Lord! How can people take that crap seriously? I'm not an atheist, but sometimes I can see their point]

[ ] Drinks blood or expresses an interest in drinking blood. (Vampires believe this is how to attain Satan. This act is very dangerous and should be stopped immediately.) [No skit]

title: Mortimer
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

Interesting question. I filled the thing trying to think how Mort would think, and added his thoughts in " ". [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]


[X] Frequently wears black clothing.
"Duh, it's the closest colour making people think of emptiness that will soon swallow them."

[-] Wears band and/or rock t-shirts.
"Music is for the mental wimps."

[-] Wears excessive black eye makeup, lipstick, or nailpolish.
"Why bother, people are ugly anyways and will die anyways."

[-] Wears any odd, silver jewelry or symbols. Some of these include: reversed crosses, pentagrams, pentacles, ankhs or various other Satanic worshipping symbols.
"There's no reason to use any symbols. All of those are crap."

[-] Shows an interest in piercings or tattoos.
"No point."

[-] Listens to gothic or any other anti-social genres of music.
"I said music is pointless, didn't you hear?"

[-] Associates with other people that dress, act or speak eccentrically.
"Those mental wimps? Oh please...."

[-] Shows a declining interest in wholesome activities, such as: the Bible, prayer, church or sports.
"None of those is needed."

[-] Shows an increasing interest in death, vampires, magic, the occult, witchcraft or anything else that involves Satan.
"There is no good or evil. Especially when the Universe is Toast."

[+] Takes drugs.
"They make me feel better, thus helping me to concentrate to get the Universe destroyed sooner."

[-] Drinks alcohol.
"Being drunk won't help."

[X] Is suicidal and/or depressed.
"There's no point in this crap, but luckily soon it'll be gone."

[-] Cuts, burns or partakes in any other method of self-mutilation.
"None mutilation would help me to work any faster."

[X] Complains of boredom.
"Beside existing pointlessly, this thing is also absolutely boring."

[-] Sleeps too excessively or too little.
"I don't need more sleep than I sleep. YMW!" (You Mental Wimp!)

[+] Is excessively awake during the night.
"I'm awake when I am."

[+] Dislikes sunlight or any other form of light.
"I don't like or dislike it, both will be gone along the Universe."

[X] Demands an unusual amount of privacy.
"Keep quiet, I'm trying to work.."

[X] Spends large amounts of time alone.
"I said I need QUIET AND PEACE!!"

[X] Requests time alone and quietness.
"How many times I have to tell you, go fucling away."

[X] Insists on spending time with friends while unaccompanied by an adult.
"There's no help of those Mr. and Mrs. IQ-lower-than-150."

[X] Disregards authority figures; teachers, priests, nuns and elders are but a few examples of this.
"I have better things to do than listen to them. Besides, I already knew more than those idiots all together, that is even before I went to school."

[+] Misbehaves at school.
[+] Misbehaves at home.
"I don't go to school, nor live home."

[+] Eats excessively or too little.
"I eat as much as candy I want to."

[-] Eats goth-related foods. Count Chocula cereal is an example of this.
"Doesn't sound good."

[-] Drinks blood or expresses an interest in drinking blood.
"Again, hurting myself wouldn't get my work done any faster."

[-] Watches cable television or any other corrupted media sources.
"Do you need to ask? NO."

[-] Plays videos games that contains violence or role-playing nature.
"Definitely NOT interested in that pointless crap."

[-] Uses the internet excessively and frequently makes time for the computer.
"Who uses the internet anymore? And if I did the required calculations myself the destruction of the Universe would be delayed for decades. Or in the worst case it wouldn't come at all!"

[-] Makes Satanic symbols and/or violently shakes head to music.
"Can't you remember what I already said about symbols or music?"

[-] Dances to music in a provocative or sexual manner.
"Dancing is futile!"

[-] Expresses an interest in sex.
"None what so ever."

[-] Is homosexual and/or bisexual.
"See previous answer, ****head."

[-] Pursues dangerous cult religions. Such include: Satanism, Scientology, Philosophy, Paganism, Wicca, Hinduism and Buddhism.
"None of those is true or reasonable. If I'm having some philosophy then it's just bad luck or a stupid coincidence."

[-] Wears pins, stickers or anything else that contains these various phrases: "I'm so gothic, I'm dead", "Woe is me", or "I'm a goth".
"No. I'm not interested."

[-] Claims to be a goth.
"I'm definitely not anything stupid goth. They can go and shoot themselves. Well, they'll die soon anyways."Eat your veggies!

[quote]Quote:[hr] Hahaha, that is so lame. It's obviously a joke and made most probably to be against Christianity by making everything extreme and most things false. It'd be the same if I claimed that everyone that uses internet is Keen Rush
[hr][/quote]
Nope, from what I hear, it's for real. I've met enough Christians to know that it could very well be legit.

title: Re: ...

HAHAHA i love how confused people are over the entire goth everything. Marilyn Manson is not even goth

[quote]Quote:[hr][X] Associates with other people that dress, act or speak eccentrically.[hr][/quote] speak eccentrically? hahahaha


[quote]Quote:[hr][X] Complains of boredom.[hr][/quote]
gee wizz im a goth!

The whole thing that goth was has become completely misconstrued. Goth people dont listen to Marilyn Manson and wear huge baggy pants that they purchased in their local mall Hot Topic chain store. Goths tend to listen to industrial and droning goth music. I dont know everything about it, because i am not one, but i know that what is called "goth" today is not goth and what is construed in this checklist thing doesnt describe gothic culture at all.
